snippet: After covering numerous Olympics, a columnist is viewing the Games via TV.
abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column reflects on watching the Olympics on television for the first time, after years of covering the Games in person; finds it to be fine summer entertainment, particularly if one reclines on the sofa and lets NBC do what it does best.
lead_paragraph: After covering numerous Olympics, a columnist is viewing the Games via TV.
